text.sectiona:
Headquartered in Singapore, we have a global presence in over 15 countries and regions, and are well-positioned as Asia’s leading financial gateway.

 

As our company grows globally, so do the career opportunities we offer across our locations. We are committed to building a deep talent pool and strong multinational teams that will support our growth. We are constantly seeking talented individuals to be part of our business, and aim to help them become the best they can be through career guidance, training for learning and development, as well as talent management and leadership programmes.

If you are passionate about making a difference and keen to work in a vibrant and exciting environment and want to be part of a motivated and valued team, then CGS International is the place for you.
text.sectionb: Discover our culture and how our strategic positioning as Asia’s leading financial services group make CGS International the best place to ignite your career.
